Lucile Gleason https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucile_Gleason 0 Lucile Webster Gleason (February 6, 1888 – May 18, 1947) was an American stage and screen actress. Gleason was also a civic worker who was active in film colony projects. Lucile_Webster_Gleason ( February_6_,_1888 – May_18_,_1947 ) was an_American_stage_and_screen_actress . Gleason was also a_civic_worker who was active in film_colony_projects .
